prices.name: Basic Plan

prices.name: Basic Plan
included: Basic video editing (cutting, trimming, and arranging footage).
Simple transitions and visual effects.
Basic color correction and audio balancing.
Adding background music and sound syncing.
Up to 5 minutes of final edited video.
Delivery time: 3-5 days.
1 round of revisions.
Standard title design.

prices.name: Advanced Plan
included: Everything in the Basic Plan.
Advanced color grading and effects.
Custom text animation and motion graphics.
Professional sound design and music synchronization.
Up to 10 minutes of final edited video.
Advanced visual effects and transitions.
Delivery time: 5-7 days.
2 rounds of revisions.
Basic title and credits design.

prices.name: Pro Plan
included: Everything in the Advanced Plan.
Multi-camera editing.
Custom 3D animations and advanced visual effects.
Professional voiceover and sound design.
Custom video templates and intros.
Up to 20 minutes of final edited video.
Unlimited revisions.
Priority support and expedited delivery (3-5 days).
Advanced title and credits design.

prices.name: Basic Plan
included: Design of 2-3 simple graphics (e.g., social media posts, posters).
Use of stock images and basic typography.
File delivery in PNG and JPG formats.
One color scheme provided by the client.
Up to 2 revisions.
Delivery within 3-5 business days.

prices.name: Standard Plan
included: Everything in the Basic Plan.
Design of 5-7 graphics (e.g., banners, flyers, or social media posts).
Custom typography and color palette tailored to your brand.
File delivery in PNG, JPG, and PDF formats.
Up to 5 revisions.
Delivery within 5-7 business days.
Option for minor custom illustrations.
excluded: Editable source files (AI, PSD) for all designs.
Multiple design concepts for each graphic.

prices.name: Pro Plan
included: Everything in the Standard Plan.
Design of 10-15 graphics (e.g., complete campaign materials or branding assets).
Custom illustrations and advanced design elements.
Editable source files (AI, PSD) for all graphics.
Delivery in multiple formats (PNG, JPG, PDF, EPS).
Unlimited revisions.
Delivery within 7-10 business days.
Comprehensive brand style guide (logo, color palette, typography).

prices.name: Basic Plan
included: Development of a basic Django-based website with up to 5 pages.
Implementation of simple features like forms or static content.
Use of default Django templates for UI.
Database setup with up to 3 tables.
Basic API endpoints (up to 2).
Code deployment on a local server or provided hosting platform.
Delivery within 7 business days.
excluded: Integration of third-party services or advanced APIs.
Ongoing support or maintenance after deployment.

prices.name: Standard Plan
included: Development of a mid-level Django application with up to 10 pages.
Integration of features like authentication and user management.
Custom UI with a basic design (using Bootstrap or similar frameworks).
Database setup with up to 10 tables and relationships.
API development with up to 5 endpoints.
Basic testing for core features.
Code deployment on AWS, Heroku, or a similar platform.
Delivery within 14 business days.
excluded: Advanced integrations (e.g., payment gateways, external APIs).

prices.name: Pro Plan
included: End-to-end development of a complex Django web application.
Custom UI/UX design tailored to your requirements.
Advanced features like payment gateways, third-party API integration, and dynamic dashboards.
Comprehensive database setup with unlimited tables and complex relationships.
API development with unlimited endpoints and documentation.
Extensive testing (unit, integration, and end-to-end).
Code deployment with CI/CD pipelines.
Performance optimization and scalability setup.
Ongoing support and maintenance for 1 month post-launch.
Delivery within 30 business days.

prices.name: Basic Plan
included: Development of a simple web application with up to 5 pages.
Frontend built using React with basic responsive design.
Backend setup using Node.js and Express with up to 3 API endpoints.
MongoDB integration with up to 3 collections.
Deployment on free-tier platforms (e.g., Heroku, Vercel).
Delivery within 10 business days.
excluded: Integration with third-party APIs or services.

prices.name: Standard Plan
included: Development of a medium-level web application with up to 10 pages.
Frontend built using React with responsive and dynamic features.
Backend setup using Node.js and Express with up to 10 API endpoints.
MongoDB integration with up to 10 collections and basic relationships.
User authentication and authorization setup (JWT-based).
Basic third-party API integration (e.g., payment gateway).

prices.name: Pro Plan
included: Development of a full-scale web application with unlimited pages.
Frontend built using React with advanced UI/UX design.
Backend setup using Node.js and Express with unlimited API endpoints.
MongoDB integration with complex relationships and advanced queries.
User authentication, authorization, and role management.
Integration with multiple third-party APIs and microservices.
Deployment with CI/CD pipelines for scalability (AWS, Google Cloud).
Extensive testing (unit, integration, E2E).
Ongoing support and maintenance for 2 months post-launch.
Performance optimization for high traffic and scalability.
Delivery within 40 business days.

prices.name: Basic Plan
included: Development of a simple mobile app with up to 3 screens.
Cross-platform support (iOS and Android).
Basic navigation (React Navigation).
Static UI components with minimal interactivity.
Integration with local device storage (e.g., AsyncStorage).
Deployment-ready APK or IPA build.

prices.name: Standard Plan
included: Development of a medium-scale app with up to 10 screens.
Cross-platform support (iOS and Android).
Custom navigation and transitions.
Integration with backend APIs for real-time data fetching.
User authentication (Firebase or custom backend).
Basic offline support with local data storage.

prices.name: Pro Plan
included: Development of a full-featured mobile app with unlimited screens.
Cross-platform support (iOS and Android).
Advanced UI/UX design with custom animations and transitions.
Integration with backend APIs and third-party services.

prices.name: Basic Plan
included: Basic keyword research and optimization for up to 5 pages.
On-page SEO: meta titles, descriptions, and basic schema setup.
Google Search Console and Analytics setup.
Mobile-friendliness audit and minor fixes.
Monthly performance report.
Delivery within 7 business days.
excluded: Content creation or blog post optimization.
Advanced technical SEO (e.g., fixing crawl errors, redirects).

prices.name: Standard Plan
included: Comprehensive keyword research for up to 10 pages.
On-page SEO: meta tags, alt text, and schema markup.
Content optimization for existing blog posts or pages.
Competitor analysis and SEO strategy recommendations.
Basic backlink building (up to 5 links per month).
Mobile and desktop speed optimization.
Monthly performance tracking and reporting.
excluded: Extensive content creation (e.g., writing new blogs or articles).
Dedicated account manager or priority support.

prices.name: Pro Plan
included: Advanced keyword research covering the entire site.
Full technical SEO audit with implementation (e.g., fixing crawl issues, XML sitemap optimization).
Content creation: 2 SEO-optimized blogs/articles per month.
Comprehensive competitor analysis and ongoing updates.
Advanced backlink building strategy (10 links per month).
Local SEO setup and optimization (Google My Business).
Voice search and featured snippet optimization.
Monthly performance tracking, reporting, and strategy adjustments.
Ongoing support for 2 months.
